trust.notice: This service is provided by an independent third party and is not affiliated with the UK Government.

step2.title: Upload Required Documents

applicationSteps.title: Simple 4-Step Process
applicationSteps.subtitle: Our streamlined process makes getting your electronic travel authorization fast and easy worldwide

step1.title: Complete Application
step1.description: Complete application forms for yourself and any travel companions with personal and travel details for any supported destination.

step2.title: Upload Documents
step2.description: Submit your passport copy and photo. Our system validates all requirements automatically.

step3.title: Secure Payment
step3.description: Pay securely with credit card, debit card, or PayPal. All transactions are encrypted globally.

step4.title: Receive Authorization
step4.description: Get your electronic travel authorization via email. Track your application status online 24/7.

footer.copyright: © 2024 UK ETA Application Service. All rights reserved.

legal.title: Legal Disclaimer
legal.content: ETAsHub is an independent third-party service provider. We are not affiliated with, endorsed by, or connected to the UK government, the UK Home Office, or any other official body. You may apply directly via the official UK government website (GOV.UK) for the government fee only. Our service includes administrative assistance, secure application handling, application tracking, document storage, and renewal reminders for an additional service fee. We do not provide legal or immigration advice. All decisions regarding ETA approvals, refusals, or processing times are made solely by the UK authorities.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.feeBreakdown: Clear fee breakdown (government fee + service fee)
transparency.noHidden: No hidden charges — complete transparency upfront

application.title: UK ETA Application Form
application.subtitle: Please fill out all required fields accurately

nameSection.title: Full Name
nameSection.description: Enter your names exactly as they appear on your passport
nameSection.helperText: Use the "Second Names" field for additional given names if they don't fit in the first name field. Leave it empty if not needed.

dateOfBirth.label: Date of Birth
dateOfBirth.helperText: Type YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY/MM/DD, or use the calendar

documents.title: Upload Documents
documents.subtitle: Please upload your passport and photo

requirements.title: Requirements:
requirements.readable: Clear, readable image of passport personal details page
requirements.visible: All text must be visible and legible

requirements.title: Photo Requirements:
requirements.noObjects: No people or objects in background
requirements.visibility: Full head, shoulders, and upper body visible
requirements.lighting: Even lighting with no shadows or glare

payment.title: Payment
payment.subtitle: Complete your payment to submit your application

details.title: Payment Details
details.security: Your payment is secured with SSL encryption and processed through trusted payment providers.

criminalConvictions.label: Have you ever had criminal convictions?

warCrimes.label: Have you ever been suspected or convicted of war crimes, terrorism or extremism?

passportPhoto.title: Passport Photo
passportPhoto.requirements: Clear image of passport information page

additionalNationalities.label: Do you have additional nationalities?
additionalNationalities.description: Select this if you hold multiple citizenships

email.invalidFormat: Please enter a valid email address
email.multipleAt: Email must have exactly one @ symbol
email.missingParts: Email must have both local part and domain

passportName.format: Use only uppercase letters A-Z, spaces, hyphens, and apostrophes
passportName.invalidStart: Name cannot start or end with spaces or special characters
passportName.consecutive: Cannot have consecutive spaces or special characters
passportName.passportFormat: Enter your name exactly as it appears on your passport

passportNumber.length: Passport number must be 6-10 characters long
passportNumber.format: Enter passport number exactly as shown on your passport

tracking.title: Track Your Application
tracking.subtitle: Enter your reference number to check your application status
tracking.hint: Your reference number was provided in your confirmation email.

descriptions.submitted: Your application was successfully received and payment confirmed.
descriptions.documentsVerified: All submitted documents have been verified and accepted.
descriptions.underReview: Your application is currently being reviewed by UK authorities.
descriptions.etaIssued: Your ETA will be issued and sent to your email once approved.

estimated.title: Estimated Completion
estimated.description: Based on current processing times, your ETA is expected to be issued within the next 24-48 hours. You will receive an email notification once your ETA is ready.

support.title: Need Assistance?
support.description: If you have any questions about your application, please contact our support team.

processingTimes.title: Processing Times
processingTimes.description: Current average processing times for UK ETA applications.

confirmation.title: Application Submitted Successfully!
confirmation.subtitle: Your UK ETA application has been received and is now being processed.

step1.title: Email Confirmation
step1.description: You'll receive an email confirmation with your application reference number.

step2.title: Application Processing
step2.description: Our team will review your application and submit it to UK authorities.

step3.title: ETA Delivery
step3.description: Your approved ETA will be sent directly to your email address.
